author: sebor
msg: (to_append): Removed the size of the array and relied on its initializer
(ehread_func): Asserted that array index is in bounds and replaced uses
of the assert() macro with RW_ASSERT().
(thread_func): Parenthesized a call to putc in order to thwart macro
expansion and qualified size_t with the name of the declaring namespace.

author: jm
msg: untaint during sa-update unlinking; also, update-creation script was ignoring all sandbox rules, T_ prefix or no, since part of the rule-QA display process was adding T_ prefixes anyway, confusing it
